price: Китобингни ўқи! Бугун сендан ҳисоб олишга нафсинг ўзи кифоя!
arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ كِتَٰبَكَ كَفَىٰ بِنَفۡسِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكَ حَسِيبٗا

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: iq'ra kitābaka kafā binafsika al-yawma ʿalayka ḥasīban
